column1: ( A - E) Immunohistochemical analyses for Ki - 67 showing significant increased expression in Parp - 1 -/-/ Ptc1 +/- compared to Ptc1 +/- mice. ( F - J) Immunohistochemical analyses for γ - H2AX showing significantly increased expression in Parp - 1 -/-/ Ptc1 +/- and Rad54 -/-/ Parp - 1 -/-/ Ptc1 +/- compared to Ptc1 +/- mice. ( K - O) Immunohistochemical analyses for cleaved caspase - 3 ( CC3) showing significantly increased expression in Rad54 -/-/ Parp - 1 -/-/ Ptc1 +/- mice compared to Rad54 -/-/ Ptc1 +/-, Parp - 1 -/-/ Ptc1 +/- or Ptc1 +/- mutant mice. ( P) The ratio between EGL and IGL area was similar in mice of all genotypes. ( Q) Significant decrease in number of mature neurons expressing NeuN in Parp - 1 -/-/ Ptc1 +/- and Rad54 -/-/ Parp - 1 -/-/ Ptc1 +/- mutants compared to Ptc1 +/- mice. ( R and S) Expression level of NeuN was determined in a fixed area ( in red) from folia VIII.
